Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Hello, <MYNAME>. Out on some errands?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Hey, have I told you about...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho! How silly!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm sorry, you have errands to run, and here I am
holding you up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll let you go, then. Take care!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
She's your type, isn't she? Elegant, capable...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She resembles my elder sister, you know. Very
closely.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not so much in terms of appearance, but
personality.
<PAGE>
My sister is very beautiful and intelligent. She
always stays composed and polite, and all the
world loves her.
<PAGE>
She is an amazing, wonderful...perfect person.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I love my sister, and I respect her a great deal.
But...sometimes I become very, very jealous of
her.
<PAGE>
My parents, my family, everyone... They all paid
attention to my perfect sister. No one had any
time for me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Miss Iris is like my sister in that regard. She is
blessed with talent and grace and looks.
<PAGE>
Even her actions sometimes remind me of
things my sister would do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm sure that the more everyone gets to know
her, the more they love her... That's how it is for
people like her.
<PAGE>
In the end, everyone likes the beautiful, talented
ones best. Even you, am I right?
Yep! She's great!
I like you better.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...I thought so.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
But for now, know that I have absolutely no
intention of breaking up with you. Yet!
<PAGE>
If you insist that you like her sort better, then I
will do everything I can to make myself learn to
hate you!
<PAGE>
It won't be easy, but I WILL find a way.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What...? You were joking? Hmph! I'm afraid it's
too late for you to pull your foot out of your
mouth now--

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Wh-wh-what do you think you're doing?! We are
in public!!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Fine. Fine! You were simply joking! I believe you!
Now step back and let me breathe!
<PAGE>
If anyone from my staff saw us now, how could
I possibly face them back at the mansion?!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Honestly! You need to develop a sense of proper
time and place for these sorts of things!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
AND you should learn that there are things one
simply does not joke about. What you said...it
honestly hurt me!
<PAGE>
Simply saying, "Oh, I was just kidding" does not
erase that.
<PAGE>
I will not have you making jokes of that sort
again. Am I clear?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good. Now then, I suddenly find myself quite
exhausted. I will be going home.
<PAGE>
Goodbye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-flattery will get you nowhere!
<PAGE>
If you thought you needed to say something out
of obligation as my significant other, forget that
nonsense right now.
<PAGE>
It is entirely unbelievable that someone would
ever prefer me over my sister! It will never
happen!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>Wh-wh-what?! You are crazy! I know this will
sound odd coming from me, but your taste in
women is highly suspect!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>No one has ever said that to me before. Not one
single person.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What do you mean you get to be "first?"
Honestly, you are so strange!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>And why are you grinning like an idiot? That was
supposed to be an insult! You're more than
strange -- you're insane!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>B-but...you've made me realize something --
besides how very weird you are. I think I
understand...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...how much you love me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A-anyway! I've just remembered some business
that needs my attention, so I must be going.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Apologies for bothering you with this odd
conversation. Good day, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I am so very glad to
have you...
